# Norddorf - High-End Web & Software Design

> Building digital assets for the AI age.
> Websites & Software. High-End. Instant. 10 Years Experience + AI Power.

## About Us
Norddorf is a specialized agency for high-end web and software design. We combine 10 years of development experience with modern AI workflows to deliver premium digital products in record time.

We focus on "Code Sovereignty" - meaning our clients own 100% of their code and assets, with no vendor lock-in.

## Services

### 1. Sonic Website (Web Design)
- **Target**: SMBs (Small & Medium Businesses)
- **Offer**: Professional website in 14 days.
- **Price**: â‚¬5,600 (Fixed Price)
- **Features**: 
  - Custom Design
  - CMS Integration (TinaCMS)
  - SEO Optimized
  - Mobile First
  - GDPR Compliant
  - 100% Ownership

### 2. Software & MVPs
- **Target**: Startups & Enterprise
- **Offer**: Rapid prototyping and MVP development.
- **Stack**: React, TypeScript, Node.js, AI Integration.
- **Philosophy**: Build fast, test early, scale with confidence.

## Key Technologies
- **Frontend**: React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS
- **CMS**: TinaCMS (Git-based, no database required)
- **Performance**: Vite, Prerendering, Edge Delivery

## Core Values
1. **Speed**: We deliver in days, not months.
2. **Quality**: High-end design and robust engineering.
3. **Ownership**: You own everything. No subscriptions, no lock-in.
4. **Transparency**: Fixed prices, clear timelines.
